text: fala 'uqsim bima tubsirun min almryyat, wama la tubsirun mimaa ghab enkm, 'iina alquran lakalam allh, ytlwh rasul eazim alsharaf walfdl, walays biqawl shaeir kama tzemwn, qalilana maa twmnwn, walays bsje ksje alkhan, qalilana maa yakun minkum tdhkkur wtammul llfrq bynhma, wlknh kalam rabu alealamin aldhy 'anzalah ealaa rasulih muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm
